description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL server configurations.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration server list
commands.summary: List all the configurations of a server in cluster.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration server list --cluster-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               --server-name
examples: az cosmosdb postgres configuration server list --server-name "test-cluster-c" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"
